name: @commercetools/api-response-normalizer
description: Helper functions to normalize API responses.
author: Dominik Ferber <dominik.ferber@commercetools.com> (https://github.com/ferber90)

scripts.build: cross-env npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min && npm run build:es && npm run build:cjs
scripts.build:umd: cross-env NODE_ENV=rollup rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js -f umd -n CommercetoolsApiResponseNormaliser -i src/index.js -o dist/commercetools-api-response-normalizer.umd.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js -f umd -n CommercetoolsApiResponseNormaliser -i src/index.js -o dist/commercetools-api-response-normalizer.umd.min.js
scripts.build:es: cross-env NODE_ENV=rollup rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js -f es -n CommercetoolsApiResponseNormaliser -i src/index.js -o dist/commercetools-api-response-normalizer.es.js
scripts.build:cjs: cross-env NODE_ENV=rollup rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js -f cjs -n CommercetoolsApiResponseNormaliser -i src/index.js -o dist/commercetools-api-response-normalizer.cjs.js
